short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record audio messages & send them via email.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RecordSnail is a Chrome extension that lets you record audio messages with just a few clicks. You can use our innovative Software as your new business tool and stand out from the crowd of unappealing text-based emails that your prospect doesn't pay that much attention to.

Build real connections with the power of audio by simply recording your message and put in the recipients data - that's it! RecordSnail creates a catching email and inserts a button that links to your audio. Every email you send is tailored to your prospect with our variable feature - so your recipient gets a personal email.

As soon as your prospect clicks on the button he can play the personal message you recorded for him and can directly contact you with just a click.

The RecordSnail extension works with with Gmail Interface but you can connect any other email address to your Gmail Interface and get started with RecordSnail right away.

Whether you are an introvert or extrovert, whether you do marketing, design, sales or something else: ‚Äç

RecordSnail helps you to get more customers!
